articles.author: Sudhi Ranjan Sen, Faseeh Mangi, Dan Strumpf, Akayla Gardner
articles.title: Trump Truce Leaves India Furious, Pakistan Elated as Risks Loom - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: After four days that saw the worst fighting between India and Pakistan in half a century, as well as some nuclear saber-rattling, Donald Trump on Saturday declared that both countries had reached a “FULL AND IMMEDIATE CEASEFIRE.”
